amendment.purpose: A substitute amendment to increase funding for NOAA by $34 million; and offsets this with a $12 million cut in NOAA shipbuilding, a $12 million cut in contributions to international organizations and conferences, and a $10 million cut in the salaries and expenses account of the Patent and Trademark Office.

action.text: Substitute (A015) offered by Mr. Rogers to the Mollohan amendment (A014).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
